channel.title: Watch Out on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Watch Out on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Apple Watch Series 11, Ultra 3, SE: Specs, Price, Release Date
item.description: Blood oxygen sensor controversies aside, improved battery life, new hypertension notifications, and the addition of satellite messaging are all good reasons to get a new Apple Watch this year.
